name: Chimerarms
description:
Your kingdom is under attack! 

Fight off 9 waves of invaders by using and combining different weapons you find!

My second ever gamejam project, not fully satisfied with the outcome, but hey, that means there's room to improve!

Edit: In hindsight, the difficulty scaling isn't quite what I had in mind, I tested it a bunch but couldn't reach what I had envisioned. I'll probably edit this submission sometime with a link to a better-scaled version!

UPDATE: Better scaled version is out now! The game should feel less slow at the beginning while still being beatable by learning the basic mechanics. You can view the update notes here!

Source code, if you are interested: https://github.com/tocshi/gamejam-miz1
